```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
experienment_data <- read.csv("../data/experienment_data/Data_phenology and warming.csv")

```

```{r}
woody <- experienment_data %>% 
  filter(class == "Woody") %>% 
  distinct(species)
```


```{r}
woody_selected <- read.csv("../data/phylogenetics/total_species.csv") %>% 
  # fill empty cell with na
  mutate_all(funs(replace(., . == "", NA))) %>%
  select(name_ex) %>% 
  # remove empty cell 
  filter(!is.na(name_ex)) 

```

```{r}
woody_selected_data <- experienment_data %>% 
  filter(class == "Woody") %>% 
  filter(species %in% woody_selected$name_ex) %>%
  
  
```
